backend/main.mo: Defines the core backend actor with session, channel, message, document, player‑document, image, and file reference types and initializes storage, authorization, and ID counters.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function converting old player document data to the new format by replacing the 'visible' flag with 'isPrivate'.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing their responsibilities across the UI, hooks, utilities, and settings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining light/dark theme color variables and global styling tokens including sidebar and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that initializes dark mode early from local storage and loads the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile setup, session restoration, routing, logout cleanup, and global error boundary usage.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that displays a recovery UI with reload and local data‑clear options when an unhandled error occurs.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat view that displays channel messages, handles auto-scroll, and sends normal or /roll messages through the actor API.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders a chat message with avatar, timestamp, and roll highlighting, resolving user profiles for avatars.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Document editor for hosts supporting text edits, file uploads with validation, and saving via actor API.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Player-facing document editor allowing content edits and privacy toggling when the user owns the document.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Avatar component showing an image or fallback initials with size options.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: User profile picture manager handling image upload, validation, progress display, and removal.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting channels using actor API with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Dialog components for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking host-managed documents using actor API calls with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Provides UI to export and import session data via actor API, including file handling, confirmation dialogs, and error reporting.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Implements dialogs and menus for players to create, rename, delete, and toggle visibility of their own documents using React query mutations.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Renders the session sidebar listing channels, host documents, and player documents with creation buttons and per-item management menus.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Settings page allowing users to change theme, background, nickname, and manage session templates with import/export and reset options.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals for messages, lists, session info, and document content.
Context provider for loading, updating, saving, and resetting user preferences including theme handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, and uploading document files using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for managing login, identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: Contains hooks for listing, reading, creating, updating, and deleting player documents with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Provides a simple polling hook that repeatedly invokes a callback at a given interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports the usePreferences hook from the PreferencesContext.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Aggregates session-related queries including session, channels, documents, messages, and selected document details.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Contains hooks for reading and updating user profiles, including the caller’s profile and profile picture removal.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with a green-accented palette.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific localStorage keys and all sessionStorage entries for resetting local app data.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Utilities for creating, parsing, inserting, and removing special file marker tags in document content.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Utilities for handling image marker tags in document content, including creation, parsing, insertion, and removal.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Manages loading, saving, and resetting user preferences in localStorage with defaults.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Validates simple dice roll patterns, checking for required characters and allowed format.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and parses session export JSON files with version checks and basic validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears session context data in localStorage.
Manages saving, loading, clearing, and validating session template data in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into human‑friendly date or time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: UI logic for hosting or joining sessions, handling forms, errors, preferences, and template application.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Displays session UI, handling channel/document selection and fetching session data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and related sessionStorage entries.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and requirements for adding a Players' Documents sidebar section and implementing per-document privacy controls. Lists existing features, pending feature requests, and architectural notes for enforcing private document visibility.
